    public class GwtTagField
extends com.google.gwt.user.client.ui.Composite
implements com.google.gwt.user.client.ui.Focusable, com.google.gwt.user.client.ui.HasEnabled, com.google.gwt.event.dom.client.KeyDownHandler, com.google.gwt.event.dom.client.ClickHandler, com.google.gwt.event.logical.shared.SelectionHandler<com.google.gwt.user.client.ui.SuggestOracle.Suggestion>, com.google.gwt.event.logical.shared.HasValueChangeHandlers<java.util.Set<java.lang.String>>
    A GWT implementation of a field that allows to select and optionally edit tags (short string labels).
